channel.title: HBS on Mr.W's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in HBS on Mr.W's Blog

item.title: How to enter QNAP NAS Mega CMD
item.description: Mega CMD is an software that provide similar function of QNAP HBS, but I don’t know why they can’t just integrated their function into HBS. And it is a command line system, though I’m not afraid of command but it truly increase the inconvenience for those who just want to make a backup. Most seriously, the way to enter the cmd window won’t show up on their readme.md but only in the introduction of the app store, with an very blurry picture.

item.title: How to make QNAP NAS DDNS functional while using Tproxy
item.description: Prerequisite: Before proceeding, it is essential to have a static public IP. If you do not already have one, kindly reach out to your ISP for assistance. Please note that if you are unfamiliar with QNAP NAS, this article may not cater to your requirements. For several reasons, you cannot connect to many cloud storage server like google drive in China, which make it difficult to fully function the HBS3(Hybrid Backup Sync).
